content: The Paul Ryan vision for America is to turn our entire country into Kansas. The simple facts are that Republican economic ideas are grounded in a myth of trickle down prosperity that has never existed in reality. It does have a proven track record of making the largest donors to the Republican Party immensely more wealthy and making the middle class all but disappear. This is the economic truth…….what Brownback has done to Kansas is what Republicans will do to America. That is not based on theory, it is based on history and fact.
